title: Telegram Bot
description: Crafted a dynamic Telegram bot using Node.js that seamlessly integrates Azure Bing services for real-time news updates, fetches current weather details, and keeps users in the loop with trending movies. This multifunctional bot not only showcases technical prowess but also offers a user-friendly experience, providing a personalized touch to news and entertainment. Explore the code on GitHub and interact with the bot live!
